body:
While this issue is focused on writes I think it's still relevant to how dask handles multi-processes and hdf5 processing:
https://github.com/dask/dask/issues/3074

Just noting that Xarray has some magic that allows it to pickle h5py objects. This is discussed in https://github.com/pydata/xarray/issues/4242. We have considered trying to break this functionality out into a standalone package. If that would be useful to Dask, we would welcome your help and involvement.
